about_the_game:
Santaower Defense

As Christmas approaches, Santa’s home is under threat from ghosts, dark magic, and the forces of darkness. It is your mission to defend Santa's sanctuary using powerful defensive structures, a single sword, and a bit of magic!

Place and upgrade a variety of structures around Santa’s sanctuary, amidst snowy forests and frozen fields, to strategically defend against the incoming hordes.

Set traps along enemy paths, drop flaming snowballs, and summon blizzards to freeze your foes.  Summon allies, command an army of snowmen, and recruit loyal knights to help protect Santa’s home from the ghostly invaders!

Gameplay

Combat alternates between Maintenance and Defense phases. In the Maintenance phase, you can spend resources to place defensive structures and prepare your strategy for the enemy’s attack. When the Defense phase begins, unpredictable waves of ghosts will assault you from various directions. Strategically place your structures and, when necessary, draw your sword to join the battle directly!

Enemies

As the battle intensifies, increasingly powerful enemies with unique abilities will appear. Some enemies use mysterious magic, while others charge at Santa with sharp horns. Occasionally, a mighty boss will emerge, capable of overwhelming your defenses in an instant. Use the Maintenance phase to devise the right strategy to defeat them!

Allies

Santa isn't alone in his fight. Various allies with unique abilities will join forces with you. A fire-breathing fish (?), armored knights who can track down hidden enemies, and even a skeleton chef who bakes delicious cookies will fight by Santa’s side. Maximize their unique abilities to strategically defeat enemies and secure victory!

  • Player-involved combat: Not just defensive play – you can join the fight by swinging your sword and taking down enemies yourself.

  • Unpredictable enemy attacks: Enemies won’t just come from one direction; they attack from a variety of unpredictable paths.

  • Unique boss battles: Experience diverse patterns and abilities from bosses that provide challenges not found in typical defense games.

  • Distinctive allies: Fight alongside allies with unusual and unique abilities, each offering different strategic uses.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or SteamOS 2.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible GPU or Vulkan capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA compatible sound card or PulseAudio compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with macOS integrated sound
